title: LoopOS
description: An AI powered ERP to manage all types of circular channels. With a set of modular apps you can setup and manage every step of the product lifecycle.

title: Sonae (Continente and Note!)
description: A web platform to purchase school books.

title: ANF (Portuguese Pharmacies)
description: A web platform to schedule services in local pharmacies.

title: Luope BuyOn
description: A mobile app that allows the purchase of goods in vending machines through multiple virtual payment methods.

title: Luope OnTheGo
description: A mobile app to help organize the daily life of a vending machine operator (both technical rapairs and refill operators).
